definitions.text: a drawback or difficulty that is not readily evident
examples: it sounds good but what's the catch?

definitions.text: something unspecified whose name is either forgotten or not known
examples: she eased the ball-shaped doodad back into its socket
there may be some great new gizmo around the corner that you will want to use
he would stoop to any device to win a point
it was a great sales gimmick
a cheap promotions gimmick for greedy businessmen
